channel.title: CVE Feed for Juniper Networks -- Junos OS running on QFX3500, QFX3600, QFX5100, QFX5200, EX4300, EX4600 devices
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Juniper Networks -- Junos OS running on QFX3500, QFX3600, QFX5100, QFX5200, EX4300, EX4600 devices

item.title: CVE-2017-2304|2024-08-05T13:48:05.313Z -- juniper%20networks -- junos%20os%20running%20on%20qfx3500%2C%20qfx3600%2C%20qfx5100%2C%20qfx5200%2C%20ex4300%2C%20ex4600%20devices
item.description: Juniper Networks QFX3500, QFX3600, QFX5100, QFX5200, EX4300 and EX4600 devices running Junos OS 14.1X53 prior to 14.1X53-D40, 15.1X53 prior to 15.1X53-D40, 15.1 prior to 15.1R2, do not pad Ethernet packets with zeros, and thus some packets can contain fragments of system memory or data from previous packets. This issue is also known as 'Etherleak'
